title: No, Sundar Pichai Did Not Cast His Vote from TN for 2019 LS Polls
subtitle: Google CEO Sundar Pichai Cast Vote in Tamil Nadu LS Election 2019 Fact Check: A post showing Google CEO Sundar Pichai casting his vote for the 2019 Lok Sabha election from Tamil Nadu has been making rounds on social media .
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
On doing a reverse image search, The Quint found that the picture with the viral post was a two-year old picture of Sundar Pichai from his visit to his alma mater, Indian Institute of Technology - Kharagpur (IITK) in West Bengal.

The picture in the viral post had been shared from his visit on his official Twitter handle on 7 January 2017.
